page.title: 04MEDINA ASIAN SWEET SHOP
page.content:
{Thornton Lodge}is an{urban area}with {terrace}housing, some being {refurbished.}It is a{built up area with few open spaces. There are{small {businesses}and three small{Mosques.
The{Medina Asian Sweet Shop}was not very busy. Only a few people came in the afternoon. The owner's{wife and {sister}made the sweets{downstairs}in the{kitchen.}The man sold Asian sweets such as{'laddoo', 'gulab jamman'}and {'matahee'}in{gift boxes.}They were displayed under a glass shelf.
The sweets were made in{very large {deep frying pans.}We saw the kitchen where the sweets were made. We saw some of the sweets still in the pan. They had only been made about twenty minutes ago.
